item.title: The Commitments - Mustang Sally - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Mustang Sally - The Commitments Written by Mack Rice, also recorded by Wilson Pickett
Featured in the film The Commitments
Using the chords: C F G7 (you can also use C7 & F7)
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
